data.comment: The match is underway at Sardegna Arena.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in Udinese.
Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese drives towards goal at Sardegna Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 5, Udinese push upfield but Marco Piccinini quickly pulls them for offside.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 8, Marco Piccinini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Udinese's half.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Cagliari in Cagliari.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Udinese's Gerard Deulofeu breaks free at Sardegna Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Cagliari awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Udinese's area.
Cagliari drive upfield and Babis Lykogiannis gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Udinese defender.
In the minute 19, Can Cagliari get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
Cagliari are in shooting range from this free kick.
Cagliari push forward at Sardegna Arena and Joao Pedro gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Udinese defence.
In the minute 21, Razvan Marin (Cagliari) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 22, Cagliari's Andrea Carboni gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Marco Piccinini awards Udinese a goal kick.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Free kick in a good position for Cagliari!
Babis Lykogiannis puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 29, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Important block from the Cagliari defence as Ignacio Pussetto fires in a strike for Udinese.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 30, Udinese have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Cagliari.
In the minute 33, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Udinese.
Udinese's Kevin Bonifazi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Cagliari defender.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
In the minute 34, Udinese's Marvin Zeegelaar misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Cagliari in their own half.
Cagliari's Riccardo Sottil gets in a shot on goal at Sardegna Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
In the minute 38, Marco Piccinini awards Udinese a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Udinese needs to be cautious. Cagliari have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 39, Udinese have a goal kick.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari just outside Udinese's area.
Throw-in Cagliari.
In the minute 44, Udinese pushes forward through Rodrigo De Paul, whose finish on goal is saved.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 45, Udinese to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
The first-half is over at Sardegna Arena.
Leonardo Pavoletti for Cagliari has been booked by Marco Piccinini and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Free kick Udinese.
In the minute 48, Kevin Bonifazi (Udinese) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Cagliari.
In the minute 50, Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Ignacio Pussetto (Udinese) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 51, In Cagliari Cagliari drive forward through Nahitan Nandez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Marco Piccinini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Udinese's half.
Gerard Deulofeu gets his shot on target but fails to score for Udinese.
In the minute 54, Udinese surge into the attack at Sardegna Arena but Jens Stryger Larsenâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
The away team have replaced Gerard Deulofeu with Kevin Lasagna. This is the first substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
In the minute 56, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Nahitan Nandez.
Kevin Lasagna levels the score at 1-1.
Great play from Ignacio Pussetto to set up the goal.
In the minute 58, Nahitan Nandez is back on the pitch.
Cagliari have a goal kick.
Marco Piccinini awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 60, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Cagliari territory.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
In the minute 63, Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Cagliari's half?
Kevin Lasagna (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Eusebio Di Francesco is making the team's first substitution at Sardegna Arena with Luca Ceppitelli replacing Leonardo Pavoletti.
In the minute 65, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Rodrigo Becao (Udinese) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
In the minute 65, Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Cagliari's half?
In the minute 67, Ignacio Pussetto for the away team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Cagliari in the half of Udinese.
Marco Piccinini awards Udinese a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Can Udinese capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Udinese close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Ball goes out of play for a Cagliari goal kick.
At Sardegna Arena, Nahitan Nandez has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari.
In the minute 75, Roberto Pereyra (Udinese) gets a yellow card.
Cagliari have been awarded a corner by Marco Piccinini.
Free kick for Cagliari in their own half.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a second substitution, with Rolando Mandragora replacing Roberto Pereyra.
Cagliari make their second substitution with Giovanni Simeone replacing Riccardo Sottil.
In the minute 78, Ilija Nestorovski is replacing Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese at Sardegna Arena.
Cagliari awarded a free kick in their own half.
Babis Lykogiannis (Cagliari) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 80, It's a goal kick for the away team in Cagliari.
Marco Piccinini awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Cagliari in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 83, Marco Piccinini signals a throw-in for Cagliari, close to Udinese's area.
Throw-in for Cagliari close to the penalty box.
Marco Piccinini signals a Cagliari throw-in in Udinese's half.
In the minute 85, Cagliari will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Udinese.
In Cagliari Udinese attack through Rolando Mandragora. The finish is off target, however.
Marco Piccinini awards Cagliari a goal kick.
In the minute 88, Gaston Pereiro is replacing Joao Pedro for Cagliari at Sardegna Arena.
The home team replace Marko Rog with Christian Oliva.
Corner awarded to Cagliari.
In the minute 89, In Cagliari, Nahitan Nandez of Cagliari is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Babis Lykogiannis of Cagliari gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
In the minute 89, The away team have replaced Jens Stryger Larsen with Hidde Ter Avest. This is the fourth substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
In Cagliari a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Marco Piccinini will wait an extra 4 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Udinese have a dangerous throw-in.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Marco Piccinini signals a free kick to Cagliari in their own half.
Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a fifth substitution, with Sebastien De Maio replacing Kevin Bonifazi.
